page.title: 07Local Firms
page.content: {E.R.Holloway Ltd}:produce cosmetics, toiletries and a range of household products for distribution to High Street stores and mail order companies at home and abroad.The firm has been well-established for over 3 decades, and employs 300 people. {Lavenham Rug Company}produces clothes for horses and riders and employs 50 people.The firm originated in Lavenham but has moved to larger premises in an old horse-hair factory in Long Melford {Lavenham Press} are printers of fine editions of books,as well as journals and magazines.About 40 people are employed and the products are sold locally and in London. {Deacons Ltd},local builders and heating engineers employ about 30 people.They use hardwoods from South America and Scandinavian softwoods in their building work.
